channel.title: idea on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in idea on Barefoot Rob

item.title: LINE stickers idea
item.description: 14:03 Wednesday 15 November 2017 JST Haha someone had a good idea for LINE stickers. I connected with Midori and Tomoko on LINE and Tomoko sent me a sticker with her name on it. Like ハーイ ともこだよ, where the fontsize for Tomoko was a bit larger than the だよ. Anyway, it’s a whole set of stickers, and I guess the artist did a whole bunch of names and pooped them all out at little extra cost beyond writing the names.
